extendedInfo.description: Easy GSMS is a group messaging application that enables sending personalized messages to groups of contacts in just a few clicks. It supports the following features:1. Sending personalized messages (through the use of tags) to selected Google contact groups and/or individual recipients. Note that, if multiple mobile numbers are associated with a contact included in a Google contact group, then the primary (first) mobile number is the one considered.2. Tags supported include adding contact's first name only "$fname", full name "$name", or company's name "$company", in case of using the application in business. Tags could easily be selected from a list, no need to remember them.3. Enables adding and managing SMS templates for fast and easy use to commonly sent messages.4. Enables adding and managing scheduled SMSs to be sent at specific date/time. After the scheduled SMS is sent, it is saved for later use (or can be deleted by the user), while the list of selected Google contact groups and/or individual recipients, to which the message is sent, is deleted.5. Enables managing Google contact groups (now in the free version!!) through adding new groups, deleting existing groups, adding new contacts to existing groups, deleting contacts from selected Google contact group, etc..

reviews.title: Not intuitive
reviews.comment: Don\'t know if it works at all. When you select a list it does not show what has been selected
reviews.author: Daniel Mashao

reviews.title: Nice
reviews.comment: Very good work by developer  But features required :  1.sent sms history 2.for dual sim ::: sim selection option

reviews.title: Review
reviews.comment: Works well but very difficult to use as there is no search option so one has to scroll down,also doesn\'t allow to check saved message.Provide option for font size as available in Groupy SMS.

reviews.title: Wont work on latest GS4
reviews.comment: Will not send to any group if you are using the Samsung galaxy S4 with 4.2.2 . No errors, no messages nothing...

reviews.title: Great easy app

reviews.title: Not reliable, good idea
reviews.comment: Great idea. I reinstalled it but have same problem. Only send I scheduled message from one template. NOT reliable. The other scheduled message did not go when I needed them. Not reliable. No log of what was sent. Too bad.
reviews.author: Alex Then

reviews.title: Superb
reviews.comment: Guys , it would be better  if u\'ll could add an option to select contacts within a group when sending a message. I usually forward jokes and quotes received from a person in a group to other people in the same group. In the process , I can\'t stop the message being sent to the sender itself.. Developers , plz add this option...

reviews.title: Easy group text app with templates

reviews.comment: Awsome app, easy to use, small in size, and feature rich
